General.Name: Huarong Chemical Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Huarong Chemical Co., Ltd. engages in the development and sale of potassium and chlorine products in China. Its products portfolio includes potassium products comprising potassium hydroxide, food additive and industrial grade, and industrial ionized membrane potassium hydroxide; refined potassium chloride; and potassium dihydrogen phosphate. The company provides chlorine products, including sodium hypochlorite, high purity hydrochloride acid, synthetic and food grade hydrochloride acid, and liquid chlorine. Its products are used in fertilizers, daily chemicals, food and medicine, new energy, electronic information, and various other industries. The company also exports its potassium hydroxide products to approximately 60 countries and regions, such as the United States, the European Union, Japan, South Korea, South America, Africa, etc. Huarong Chemical Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Pengzhou, China.
